apiClassifier.shortdesc:
A scheduler that distributes work on a timer, limiting the total execution time per 'switch' to maintain a framerate
Adding more work results in the work taking longer to complete, but the framerate remaining constant
To benefit from GreenThreadScheduler, scheduled actions should execute in this smallest possible time (ie.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
A scheduler that distributes work on a timer, limiting the total execution time per 'switch' to maintain a framerate
Adding more work results in the work taking longer to complete, but the framerate remaining constant
To benefit from GreenThreadScheduler, scheduled actions should execute in this smallest possible time (ie. be designed to be run many times

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides static helpers to schedulers
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Provides static helpers to schedulers

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Used to distribute workload
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Used to distribute workload

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A scheduler that executes actions immediately, or immediately after their dueTime (if specified).
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A scheduler that executes actions immediately, or immediately after their dueTime (if specified).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Concrete implementation of IConnectableObservable
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Concrete implementation of IConnectableObservable

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A subject that replays the last value (or error) received to observers that subscribe after the sequence has completed
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A subject that replays the last value (or error) received to observers that subscribe after the sequence has completed

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a 'pending' hot observable.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a 'pending' hot observable. Calling connect will turn the observable into a hot observable. Calling refCount will turn the observable into a hot observable when the first observer subscribes

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Subclass this class only if you want to implement a completely custom IObservable.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
Subclass this class only if you want to implement a completely custom IObservable.
If you can avoid it, however, try to stick to subclassing Subject or using one of the creation methods.
This class may be made inaccessible in future revisions

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a cancelable resource that controls multiple other cancelable resources
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a cancelable resource that controls multiple other cancelable resources

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A Subject is both an IObservable and an IObserver, so it can be returned as an IObservable and fed values through the IObserver methods.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
A Subject is both an IObservable and an IObserver, so it can be returned as an IObservable and fed values through the IObserver methods.
When returning a Subject as an IObservable, it's recommended that you return subject.asObservable() to hide the original instance

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides static methods that create cancelable resources
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Provides static methods that create cancelable resources

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An observable sequence of values
apiClassifier.apiDesc: An observable sequence of values

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A wrapper that adds a timestamp to a value
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A wrapper that adds a timestamp to a value

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A cancelable resource than is not immediately available
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A cancelable resource than is not immediately available

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides static methods that create observers
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Provides static methods that create observers

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A wrapper that adds the time interval, in milliseconds, since the last values

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents one of the three messages that can be sent to an observer.
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents one of the three messages that can be sent to an observer.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a valueClass that can be used when an observable sequence logically has no valueClass
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a valueClass that can be used when an observable sequence logically has no valueClass

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides static methods that create observable sequences
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Provides static methods that create observable sequences

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a handle that can be used to cancel an operation
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a handle that can be used to cancel an operation

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Enumeration for the different types of Notification
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Enumeration for the different types of Notification

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a cancelable operation, the canceled status of which can be checked by isCanceled
apiClassifier.apiDesc: Represents a cancelable operation, the canceled status of which can be checked by isCanceled

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A resource that is both observable and an observer

apiClassifier.shortdesc:
A combination of multiple IObservable sequences that can be combined into a Plan
Generally, a Pattern will be created using IObservable.and or Pattern.and(), rather than creating a Pattern directly
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
A combination of multiple IObservable sequences that can be combined into a Plan
Generally, a Pattern will be created using IObservable.and or Pattern.and(), rather than creating a Pattern directly

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An object that receives messages from an IObservable sequence
apiClassifier.apiDesc: An object that receives messages from an IObservable sequence

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A Notification for an onNext call
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A Notification for an onNext call

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An error thrown by Observable.timeout by default
apiClassifier.apiDesc: An error thrown by Observable.timeout by default

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A Notification for an onCompleted call
apiClassifier.apiDesc: A Notification for an onCompleted call

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A combination of IObservable sequences and a selector that will map the values of those sequences to an output value.
apiClassifier.apiDesc:
A combination of IObservable sequences and a selector that will map the values of those sequences to an output value. A plan is intended to be used with Observable.join
Generally, a Plan will be created using Pattern.then(), rather than creating a Plan directly
